Posts.Title: friggin brain biopsy results :< chainsawz AnacortesGirl

Posts.Content: Apr 3, 2012 04:55AM mmswarowski wrote: Having those drains taken out is the very best thing ever! The whole shower thing is so funny and seems to vary surgeon to surgeon! I had no recon and that could be why my experience is a bit different but I was able to shower 24 hours later! My only instruction was to face away from the shower. Janice as far as showering with the drains my doctor gave me a lanyard (one of those things you wear a nametag from and I hooked the drains on that and they hung from there and I showered. As nice as taking a shower was, with the tiredness that everyone describes I really would lay in bed and look at the door to the bathroom thinking how nice it would be to have the engery to shower! Glad everyone is coming along and healing! Maryellen
Posts.Title: Hooray! Drain tubes out today! icefishinglady mmswarowski
